error.already_configured: This integration is already configured. Please edit the existing integration instead.

provider.label: Provider
provider.helper_text: Changing service provider is not possible after creation.

avalara-service-url.label: Service URL
avalara-service-url.helper_text: If in test mode, it should be https://development.avalara.net. If in production, it should be https://avatax.avalara.net unless a different Service URL has been provided to you by Avalara.

avalara-id.label: Account number
avalara-id.helper_text: Be sure to use either a development or production value based on your Service URL.

avalara-key.label: License key
avalara-key.helper_text: Be sure to use either a development or production value based on your Service URL.

avalara-company-code.label: Company code
avalara-company-code.helper_text: Be sure to use either a development or production value based on your Service URL.

avalara-category-to-product-tax-code-map.label: Category to product tax code mappings
avalara-category-to-product-tax-code-map.helper_text: Replace Foxy category codes with AvaTax tax codes when sending data to Avalara. If left empty, the category code will be sent to AvaTax instead.
avalara-category-to-product-tax-code-map.v8n_required: Please add at least one tax code mapping.

taxjar-api-token.label: API token
taxjar-api-token.helper_text: Your SmartCalcs API token obtained from TaxJar.

taxjar-category-to-product-tax-code-mapp.label: Category to product tax code mappings
taxjar-category-to-product-tax-code-mapp.helper_text: Replace Foxy category codes with TaxJar tax codes when sending data to TaxJar. If left empty, the category code will be sent to TaxJar instead.

onesource-service-url.label: Service URL
onesource-service-url.helper_text: The ONESOURCE service URL you want to connect to.

onesource-external-company-id.label: External company ID
onesource-external-company-id.helper_text: External company ID mapping to the Determination company owning the audit data.
onesource-external-company-id.v8n_required: Please enter an external company ID.

onesource-calling-system-number.label: Calling system number
onesource-calling-system-number.helper_text: A unique identifier for your ERP system. The combination of Calling System Number, Host System, and Unique Invoice Number form a unique key for an invoice in the Audit Database.
onesource-calling-system-number.v8n_required: Please enter a calling system number.

onesource-from-city.label: From city
onesource-from-city.helper_text: This city should match the postal code and country you have configured in your settings.

onesource-host-system.label: Host system
onesource-host-system.helper_text: A unique name for your ERP system. The combination of Calling System Number, Host System, and Unique Invoice Number form a unique key for an invoice in the Audit Database.

onesource-company-role.label: Company role
onesource-company-role.helper_text: The role the company plays in a given transaction. Each role results in different transaction tax and reporting requirements.

onesource-part-number-product-option.label: Custom product option name
onesource-part-number-product-option.helper_text: If you use a custom product option name to specify your part number such as SKU or ISBN, enter that name here here. You can also set it to "code" to use the standard product code attribute.

onesource-product-order-priority.label: Custom product order
onesource-product-order-priority.helper_text: The PRODUCT_CODE field in ONESOURCE is populated via the Foxy category code. The first shippable product will have the RELATED_LINE_NUMBER associated with it. To control which product is listed first, add a list of Foxy category codes here based on the order priority you'd like.

onesource-audit-settings.label: Audit
onesource-audit-settings.helper_text: When completing a transaction, use this setting to determine if the information sent to Onesource will be audited and reported.

webhook-service.label: Payload format
webhook-service.helper_text: Use JSON for new services. XML webhooks are deprecated and may be removed in the future.

webhook-json-title.label: Provider
webhook-json-title.helper_text: A descriptive title that identies your custom service.

webhook-json-encryption-key.label: Encryption key
webhook-json-encryption-key.helper_text: This value is used as they key to encrypt the and verify the payload sent for the webhook.

webhook-json-url.label: Webhook URL
webhook-json-url.helper_text: The absolute URL (beginning with https:// or http://) to which Foxy will send the webhook on selected events.

webhook-json-events.label: Events
webhook-json-events.helper_text: Select at least one event that will trigger this webhook.

webhook-warning.warning_text: We are winding down support for custom services that rely on legacy webhooks and XML datafeed. Please consider using the new JSON webhooks instead.

webhook-legacy-xml-title.label: Provider
webhook-legacy-xml-title.helper_text: A descriptive title that identies your custom service.

webhook-legacy-xml-url.label: Webhook URL
webhook-legacy-xml-url.helper_text: The absolute URL (beginning with https:// or http://) to which Foxy will send the webhook on selected events.

webflow-site-id.label: Site ID
webflow-site-id.helper_text: The Site ID of your Webflow site.

webflow-site-name.label: Site name
webflow-site-name.helper_text: The name of your Webflow site.

webflow-collection-id.label: Collection ID
webflow-collection-id.helper_text: The ID of the collection that products are stored in.

webflow-collection-name.label: Collection name
webflow-collection-name.helper_text: The name of your products collection.

webflow-sku-field-id.label: SKU field ID
webflow-sku-field-id.helper_text: The ID of the code field in your products collection.
webflow-sku-field-id.v8n_required: Please enter a SKU field ID.

webflow-sku-field-name.label: SKU field name
webflow-sku-field-name.helper_text: The name of the code field in your products collection.
webflow-sku-field-name.v8n_required: Please enter a SKU field name.

webflow-inventory-field-id.label: Inventory field ID
webflow-inventory-field-id.helper_text: The ID of the inventory field in your products collection.
webflow-inventory-field-id.v8n_required: Please enter an inventory field ID.

webflow-inventory-field-name.label: Inventory field name
webflow-inventory-field-name.helper_text: The name of the inventory field in your products collection.
webflow-inventory-field-name.v8n_required: Please enter an inventory field name.

zapier-event.label: Event
zapier-event.helper_text: The event this zap is subscribed to.

zapier-warning.warning_text: Zapier webhooks are read-only and can not be created or modified in the Foxy Admin. Please connect your Zapier webhooks at zapier.com.

apple-pay-merchant-id.label: Merchant ID
apple-pay-merchant-id.helper_text: This identifier is configured automatically when you enable Apple Pay in your store settings.

apple-pay-warning.warning_text: Apple Pay native integration entry on this page is informational. To configure Apple Pay, please go to your gateway settings.

custom-tax-url.label: URL
custom-tax-url.helper_text: The URL of your custom tax service.

custom-tax-warning.warning_text: It is currently not possible to configure this integration in this new admin app. Please use the legacy app at admin.foxycart.com to make changes.

delete.delete_prompt: Please confirm that you want to delete this integration. This action cannot be undone.
